page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content: From research carried out into the activities offered at the leisure centre, for 7-8 year age group and 10-11 year age group, there were similarities. Swimming and physical education were the most popoular, perhaps because these are part of their schooling. Children of the younger age range normally only attend under parental supervision or with friends, whereas later they attend unaccompanied and so the number increases. {SWIMMING CLUB-}The club, held on Mondays and Fridays, costs 30p per night or Â£1.50 for the year. The club swimming costume is black with a yellow stripe down the side and a matching hat. {BALLET-}This class(six girls)is held on a Saturday morning and costs 75p for 45 mins. For this we wear a tutu.
